rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample space for coats and shoes, aligned in the North facing area to allow natural light as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Living-Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan area combining living and dining spaces. Features a large window on the South side for balanced energy flow, following traditional Chettinad style with carved wooden elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Designed with efficient workflow and ventilation considerations in line with Vastu principles by placing it to the South-East corner.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable master bedroom on the ground floor with an ensuite bathroom for convenience, placed in a quiet zone of the bungalow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom allocated for visitors. Positioned to maintain privacy and energy balance.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated space for domestic staff on the ground floor for easy access while preserving privacy with a separate entrance from the main area.

openings.name: Living Area Window
openings.location: South facade of living area for enhanced natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Kitchen Ventilation Opening
openings.location: East wall of kitchen to maintain proper exhaust flow
